Privacy Policy for CUBED Effective Date: 3/7/2024 Introduction Welcome to CUBED, a simple Android game developed using Unity. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of data we collect and how we use it. Information We Collect Non-Personal Information We do not collect any personal information such as your name, email address, or phone number. The game does not request or access any phone features such as the camera or microphone. UnityAds CUBED uses UnityAds for an "opt-In" reward system, meaning you can choose to watch an advertisement to receive a reward. UnityAds may collect non-personal information such as device type, operating system, and general location data. This information is used to serve relevant ads and improve the advertising experience. For more information on how UnityAds collects and uses data, please review the Unity Privacy Policy. How We Use Information UnityAds The non-personal information collected by UnityAds is used to: Serve relevant advertisements within the game. Provide rewards for watching advertisements. Improve the overall advertising experience. Third-Party Services CUBED uses UnityAds as a third-party service provider. We do not share any additional information with other third parties. Data Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of data. However, please be aware that no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. It is advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at J3GamesContact@gmail.com By using CUBED, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for playing CUBED!
